EmailTemplate.name: Residential_Seminar_0314
EmailTemplate.subject: INVITATION: Seminar - Update on Part L 2013 for England
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
AECOM Seminar - Update on Part L 2013 for England
Come and listen to how the new regulations will affect residential development. AECOM has unique insight having undertaken the analysis that underpin these changes.
New regulations will come into force from 6th April 2014 New Homes — Headline figure is a 6% reduction in CO2 emissions over Part L 2010 standards.
Date Thursday 20 March 2014
Time 8.30 am Breakfast - Coffee and croissants 9.00 am Seminar 10.00 am Close
Venue Room 8–9, Floor 4, MidCity Place 71 High Holborn, London, WC1V 6QS
RSVP Please RSVP to sue.parmenter@aecom.com by 13 March 2014.
